page.title: 15WHEATHAMPSTEAD GAMES & SPORT
page.content:
{Cricket.}This is a summer game played by two teams of eleven players. One team bats and the other fields. The batsmen run between two wickets and score runs.
{Rounders}is a game for girls and boys. You have two teams. You have a bat and the bowler has a ball and throws the ball and the one with the bat hits it.He can run to first place if he wants to.Some boys and girls hit the ball.It goes up and if someone catches the ball the boy or girl is out.
{Netball}is a game for girls and you have teams.There two nets one team shoots into one net and the other into the other net.When one team gets a goal the ball goes back into the centre.Then you start again.
